description.intro: Phabase is a public genomic database dedicated to Phaseolus spp., particularly to black bean Phaseolus vulgaris var. Negro Jamapa, an important crop in Mexico. The project offers access to high-quality genomic data, interactive tools for exploration and comparison, and integration with genome browsers and BLAST search functionality. Additionally, this platform offers a gene expression atlas, which integrates available transcriptome data from diferentes √≥rganos y tejidos de P. vulgaris bajo distintas condiciones.
Our mission is to support scientific research, agricultural improvement, and the conservation of the Negro Jamapa black bean by providing open and structured access to its genomic information.
